0.title: AgencyMai
0.shortDescription: At AgencyMai I've worked at different projects some on Laravel some on Wordpress

1.title: BigRock
1.shortDescription: For BigRock Ive created a LMS on Laravel with VueJS

2.title: RunRepeat
2.shortDescription: At the beginning I've created the WordPress Website for runrepeat.com than we have created a web app in laravel for extracting prices from Amazon and other affiliates programs like CJ than we have migrated the entire website on Laravel

3.title: Ignite Studio
3.shortDescription: In the time I've collaborated with Ignite studio, I've created websites using WordPress CMS and web aps using Yii framework

4.title: Freelance Web Developer
4.shortDescription: In 2006 I've started my journey as a freelance web developer.

5.title: Maintenance Electrician at Al Morrell Development
5.shortDescription: My role here was to maintain the electrical devices on the water bottling plant in the US military base Q-West Iraq.

6.title: County Emergency Clinical Hospital of Targu Mures
6.shortDescription: PACS Engineer - My role here was to maintain the images server connected to all imaging devices like: MRI, CT scan and so on ... In this Time I've also created the firs hospital website, It was modified since that time https://www.spitalmures.ro/

7.title: Web development journey has started here
7.shortDescription:
One of my colleague at Carel Telecommunications, knew a bit of html and css, and has done a website for the company, seeing what he is doing and the result I thought I can do that also, even better. This is when my passion for web development has started.

I've started with HTML, than CSS. I've also tried a bit of server side C++ but it looked to hard for what I needed at that time, so I've searched for an alternative way, and I've found PHP and MySQL and I've stuck with them ever since.

8.title: Carel Telecommunications
8.shortDescription: My main job here was to install and program the telephony servers.

9.title: Burger King - Germany
9.shortDescription: It was a nice experience and, in addition to flipping burgers, I've found another world here another way of thinking diffrent from what I was used to see in Romania, this has helped me a lot

10.title: Petru Maior University - Electronics and Automation
10.shortDescription:
As in high school i've continued to pursuit my passion for electronics but here I've discovered a new world, the world of software

Here I've started to learn C++ and microprocessors programming. Because my focus until this time was the hardware, I was not very good at software.

11.title: Electromures High School - Electronics
11.shortDescription: In high school I've continued to pursuit my passion for electronics

12.title: Kids Club - Electronics
12.shortDescription: I've always been attracted to disassemble things to see how they are working, at the kids club I've learned how to build electronic devices with transistors, led's, capacitors ....
